dc_title_s: Geographical, historical, and statistical map of America.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially.  Shows political divisions of North and South America and routes of exploration taken by Columbus, Cortez, and Pizarro.  Includes notes and text: America--Political Divisions of America--Discovery and First Settlement of America by Europeans.  Young & Delleker, Sc.  "Printed by T.H. Palmer for M. Carey & Son, from the London Edition of 1817, with corrections and additions."    Contents: North America / drawn from the most recent authorities with the tracks of Columbus and Cortez ; improved to 1820 by E. Paguenaud -- South America : with the conquests of Pizarro for the elucidation of Lavoisnes's genealogical, historical, chronological & geographical atlas / by J. Aspin ; improved to 1820 by E. Paguenaud.|22 x 21 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:35,000,000|General Map Collection
